Title: Takiawase
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Scott Nimerfro, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: The FBI is called in when a dead body is discovered, the skull converted into a beehive. Meanwhile Beverly Katz finds a clue about the mural killer that sends her down a deadly path.
